bio: I am a full time crypto researcher, passionate about its technology and dynamic
impactDescription: I write and share knowledge about current and upcoming trends in crypto, DeFi, and other technologies in general and in-depth. Right now because Ethereum Layer 2 is one of the most important trend now and in the future, so very often I will write about Optimism and its OP stack, Superchain and why it's one of the most promising tech to build Layer 2s for the scalability future of Ethereum
contributionDescription: I work full time in crypto. That's why I have quite good and deep understanding about the trends and technology. In addition to researching and writing for my job, I also share my viewpoint and insight about crypto and technology in my Twitter and Medium.
